Description: High-quality, two bed, one bath unit on the first floor of beautiful 2-family in East Watertown. Stainless steel appliances & granite counter tops, new bathroom with large tiled shower, hardwood floors throughout, closet space, washer/dryer in-unit high efficiency heating system, thermal pain windows, & new front porch. Sorry, no pets. Water/sewer, gas and electric paid by tenant. No Pets Allowed (RLNE8166104)
